===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} [[patterned]] [[window]]; a [[clear]] and [[bright]] window; [[shining]], [[brightness]]
#* {{zh-x|'''囧{jiǒng}'''，窗牖 麗廔{lóu} 闓明，象形。|'''Jiong''' — An open and light window. Pictographic.|ref=Shuowen|CL}}
#* {{zh-x|'''囧{jiǒng} 囧{jiǒng}''' 秋 月 明，憑 軒 詠 ^堯 ^老。|The moonlight at an autumn night was '''brightly clean'''; I leaned on the railing, chanting poems and savouring the logics of the ancient sages (lit. of {{w|Emperor Yao|Yao}} and {{w|Laozi}}).|ref=Jiang Yan, "Miscellaneous Poems — ''Imitation of Zhang Chuo's 'Miscellaneous Writing'''", from the anthology of ''{{w|Wen Xuan}}''}}
# {{lb|zh|neologism|slang|jocular}} an [[emoticon]] expressing [[surprise]], [[shock]], [[embarrassment]], [[helplessness]] or [[awkwardness]]
#* {{zh-x|而 那些 生活 在 光環 中 的 明星 和 名人 們，曾經 也 有 過 類似 的 經歷，他們 難忘 的 往事 中 也 不乏 趣聞 和 '''囧{jiǒng}''' 事……^李 ^想 在 高三 時 選擇 放棄 高考，卻 成功 創業，身價 上 億。|The celebrities and notabilities now living under spotlights used to have similar experiences; there was no lack of amusing anecdotes and '''embarrassing''' moments in their unforgettable pasts ... Li Xiang dropped out of school during the third year of high school, choosing not to take the University Entrance Examination. Instead, he successfully started an enterprise, now worth hundreds of millions.|ref=Xinhua, 《[http://big5.xinhuanet.com/gate/big5/news.xinhuanet.com/overseas/2011-06/07/c_121501794.htm 眾名人爆料高考囧事]》 ("''Celebrities reveal their embarrassing moments before/at the {{w|National Higher Education Entrance Examination|University Entrance Examination}}''")}}
